revised_title: An Investigation into the Resistance of Tubes to Collapse and the Development of Proportioning Rules for Boiler Flues
tldr: This article presents a series of experiments conducted to determine the laws governing the strength of cylindrical vessels exposed to external pressure and to develop proportioning rules for boiler flues. The author investigates the resistance of tubes to collapse and finds that tube length significantly affects their strength. The findings contribute to the improvement of boiler construction and safety.
